financialDashboardPage.noCustomerRevenueData: No customer revenue data available for this period.
financialDashboardPage.noStockUsageData: No stock usage data available for this period.
financialDashboardPage.quickbooksPitch: Currently, you're viewing financial data based on your internal jobs and invoices. Connect to QuickBooks to unlock advanced financial reporting, reconcile accounts, and streamline tax preparation.
financialDashboardPage.noChartData: No chart data available for the selected period.

staffPage.noStaffFound: No staff members found. Click "Add New Staff" to get started!

settingsPage.failedToLoadSettings: Failed to load settings or profile data.
settingsPage.permissionError: You do not have permission to update company settings.
settingsPage.failedToSaveProfile: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
settingsPage.passwordsMismatch: New password and confirm password do not match.
settingsPage.passwordMinLength: New password must be at least 6 characters long.
settingsPage.noAuthenticatedUser: No authenticated user found. Please log in again.
settingsPage.passwordChangeSuccess: Password changed successfully! You may need to log in again shortly.
settingsPage.failedToChangePassword: Failed to change password. Please ensure your current password is correct.
settingsPage.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log out and log back in, then try again.
settingsPage.weakPassword: New password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
settingsPage.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
settingsPage.operationNotAllowed: Operation not allowed. This could be due to a temporary issue or specific Firebase project settings. Please try again or contact support.
settingsPage.newEmailPasswordRequired: New email and current password are required.
settingsPage.emailSameAsCurrent: New email cannot be the same as the current email.
settingsPage.emailChangeVerificationSent: Email change initiated! A verification email has been sent to your NEW email address ({{newEmail}}). Please click the link in that email to complete the change. You may need to log in again with your new email after verification.
settingsPage.invalidNewEmail: The new email address is not valid.
settingsPage.emailAlreadyInUse: This email address is already in use by another account.
settingsPage.incorrectCurrentPasswordForEmail: Incorrect current password provided for email change.
settingsPage.logoUploadHelpText: PNG, JPG, or GIF up to 10MB
settingsPage.invoicePrefixHelpText: Prefix for your invoice numbers (e.g., INV-)

settingsPage.defaultTaxRateHelpText: Default tax rate applied to new invoice items.
settingsPage.welcomeEmailHelpText: Send a welcome email to new customers.
settingsPage.invoiceEmailHelpText: Automatically send invoices to customers upon creation/completion.
settingsPage.daysBeforeAppointmentHelpText: Send reminder email X days before an appointment.
settingsPage.jobCompletionEmailHelpText: Send an email upon job completion.
settingsPage.daysAfterDueDateHelpText: Send reminder email X days after invoice due date if unpaid.
settingsPage.daysAfterJobCompletionHelpText: Send a review request email X days after job completion (max 6 months).

stripe.title: Stripe Connect Integration
stripe.connectDescription: To accept payments directly into your own Stripe account, you need to connect it to ServiceOS. This allows customers to pay you directly through the platform.
stripe.platformFeeNote: Note: Payments processed through your connected Stripe account will be subject to Stripe's fees plus a small platform fee (e.g., 1%) from ServiceOS.
stripe.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect your Stripe account? You will no longer be able to receive payments through ServiceOS until reconnected.
stripe.actionRequiredDescription: Your Stripe account is connected, but you need to provide more information to Stripe to enable payouts. Click 'Complete Onboarding' to finish setting up your account.
stripe.onboardingLinkError: Failed to generate Stripe onboarding link.
stripe.dashboardLinkError: Failed to generate Stripe dashboard link.

settingsPage.defaultCurrencyCodeHelpText: Choose the primary currency for your business transactions.
settingsPage.currencySymbolHelpText: The symbol displayed before or after currency amounts (e.g., $, Â£, â‚¬).
settingsPage.decimalPlacesHelpText: Number of digits after the decimal point (e.g., 2 for 0.00).
settingsPage.thousandSeparatorHelpText: Character used to separate thousands (e.g., comma ',' or period '.').
settingsPage.decimalSeparatorHelpText: Character used to separate the decimal part (e.g., period '.' or comma ',').
settingsPage.formatTemplateHelpText: Define how currency amounts are displayed. Use {symbol} for the currency symbol and {amount} for the value (e.g., {symbol}{amount} for $100.00 or {amount} {symbol} for 100,00 â‚¬).
settingsPage.emailHelpText: Your primary login email. To change this, use the 'Change Email' section below.
settingsPage.selectLanguageHelpText: Choose the preferred language for the application interface.
